column4: well , here goes: I've just install ubuntu on my laptop. Bit overwhelmed by it. I cant enable desktop effects, as i get a white screen. I've searched the forums for a solution but did not find one which worked. To the best of my (limited knowledge) it would appear that GLX for my nvidia 7300GO card is not functioning properly. (I also get a: Failed to allocate mem message when the kernel boots)
disable desktop effects then set your card up first
how do i setup my card ? (I'm a linux newb)
there is an entry for restricted drivers -system - admin - restrict... - go there
I only see an entry for my wireless in the restricted drivers
go to system - admin - synaptic  -  then click search  -  enter nvidia
there is no such option in the menu. but i can do : sudo synaptic
u r saying there is no entry for synaptic packet manager
my bad, found it
there is a whole lot of packages there
by now synaptic to me is synaptic packet manager - apologies
I see a whole bunch of glx related packages
a min
if it is not " 64 " not ' devel ' not to do with a game then it is what will help
overclock is at your choice
i installed ubuntu 7.04 (64) btw
that's what I just used to check the repositories
do you have all repositories enabled?
how do i know
at the top of the synaptic package manager there is -  settings - click that - repositories
there is an oppurtunity to have the chat page on one window & synaptic on another to avoid clutter - different to windows
using two different computers, another one for the chat
you can do it all on one - I have chat on one window bittorrent on anothern - movie - & synaptic  making four open windows
